tool_description: Collects real-time metrics from containers including CPU, memory, disk I/O, and network statistics across specified namespaces and time ranges.

metrics_types.description: Types of metrics to collect: cpu, memory, disk_io, network, filesystem

error_messages: Invalid namespace: Namespace does not exist or access denied. Verify namespace name and permissions.
Container not found: One or more specified containers do not exist in the namespace.
Invalid metrics type: Use only supported types [cpu, memory, disk_io, network, filesystem].
Invalid sampling interval: Must be between 1-3600 seconds.
Invalid duration: Must be between 1-1440 minutes.
Collection timeout: Metrics collection timed out. Check container and network connectivity.
usage: Specify namespace and metrics_types, optionally filter by container_names and set sampling_interval and duration. Returns timestamped metrics data for analysis.

cpu_usage_percent.description: CPU usage percentages corresponding to timestamps

memory_usage_bytes.description: Memory usage in bytes corresponding to timestamps
